function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Bats as native host of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of zoonotic transmission to humans","Mitigation":"Research on transmission pathways and preventive measures for human exposure","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, surveillance of wildlife populations","People":"Researchers, public health officials, wildlife workers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Human-to-human transmission and infectious incubation","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of the virus within communities","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, promoting personal hygiene practices, and isolation protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, rapid testing kits, public health campaigns","People":"General public, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"Public health organizations, government, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in basic reproduction number (R0)","Impact":"Challenges in predicting and containing the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Continued research to narrow down the range of R0, development of predictive models for epidemic control","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, data analytics, advanced surveillance systems","People":"Epidemiologists, data scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
